1.0.name: wordpress/wordsfinder-keywordtag-generator
1.0.description:
This plugin generates tags (keywords) for your posts while writing or editing, using the Wordsfinder API. All the action happens in a box on the top right corner. Click on the generated tags to add them as categories or edit them as usual. Visit Wordsfinder's home page for info on how to get a FREE API key.

1.4 Update Working with WP 2.8

1.3 Update Now working with WP 2.7 and new algorithm.

1.2 Update Now working with WP 2.5

1.1 Update Now the plugin box works together with the usual Tags input improving compatibility with other plugins.
